snippet: Songwriters whose works are being staged in the New York Musical Theater Festival have chosen their favorite summer tunes from their lives and their shows.
abstract: Several composers whose works are being staged in the New York Musical Theater Festival share their favorite tunes from their lives and their shows.
lead_paragraph: Songwriters whose works are being staged in the New York Musical Theater Festival have chosen their favorite summer tunes from their lives and their shows.

headline.seo: Summer Favorites of Theater Festival Composers
headline.main: Songs to Underscore a Road Trip or Musical
